Description: Book of the Dead of Irthorru; sheet 2; Hieratic text in four columns; empty spaces for vignettes.
Curator's comments: The four sheets have been numbered in an incorrect order. The correct sequence is: 3, 1, 2, 4. (JHT)
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (94)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57234) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57234)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, bloom, loss Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: good
